topic.title: Cabo Fish Taco Queso Dip
topic.shortdesc: One thing I am passionate about in life is queso - the perfect appetizer especially at Cabo Fish Taco. Their queso is my 2nd favorite queso of all time (Moes queso can't be topped and I stand by that!) It is more than just a dip

image.alt: Image of the outside of Cabo Fish Taco in Blacksburg.

body.p: Cabo's Queso Dip is served with fresh and warm tortilla chips and is creamy and flavorful. It has peppers in it to add texture and flavor and is a fantastic starter at Cabo. It pairs perfectly with any item on their menu - especially their quesadillas!
